channel.title: OSX on Emain Ablach
channel.description: Recent content in OSX on Emain Ablach

item.title: Compile ruby with rbenv and brew-installed tcl-tk
item.description: It happens to be the case where I run into the need of using ruby and tk.Anyway, it tooks me a while to figure out how to compile a ruby by using rbenv and ruby-build with a brew-installed tcl-tk library.

item.title: Python environment configuration for Neovim
item.description: Today I managed to set up the Python environment for Neovim, which is a little bit tricky, so I decide to write down the problems I overcame so that someone could be helped to configure these easily.

item.title: Run Foobar2000 in Mac
item.description:
Today I realized that iTunes does not support *.flac files at all. Stubborn user as I am, NO ONE can force me to get used to their way of doing things. It’s okay for iTunes to only support its own format of lossless music, but I just choose to not use it.

So here is how I tried to get my favorite Foobar2000 to work in osx by using wineskin:
